valueProp: Steinbrecher & Span LLP is a litigation law firm consisting of attorneys with decades of high-end, sophisticated business litigation experience.

testimonalData.text: Steinbrecher & Span is the 'go to' law firm. Their commitment to their clients coupled with their extraordinary legal talents always brings excellent results.
testimonalData.author: Gretchen Nelson

testimonalData.text: You get high-level representation but not at big firm prices.
testimonalData.author: Tarini Ramprakash

testimonalData.text: We've used them for the past 25 years. They are the go-to guys on federal pre-emption issues.
